newsitem.title: UK: July Flotta schedules 5.8 mln bbls in 10 cargoes.
newsitem.headline: July Flotta schedules 5.8 mln bbls in 10 cargoes.

text.p: Britain's North Sea Flotta oilfield system has scheduled 10 cargoes to load in July totalling 5.8 million barrels, traders said on Monday.
The July programme compares with a revised June programme of 5.3 million barrels in nine cargoes.
Two of the original 11-cargo Flotta programme for June were cancelled after a delay in the start of the MacCulloch oilfield.
The first scheduled July Flotta cargo is not due to load until July 5-7 to allow for the late lifting of remaining June cargoes, traders said.
